title: Bloomberg's House on Puerto Rico Restructuring Debt Bill(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's House on Puerto Rico Restructuring Debt Bill(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Billy House, Bloomberg Congressional Reporter, on the House reaching an agreement with the Treasury on a Puerto Rico restructuring bill for its $70 billion debt load.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
